Repro Steps: Start program in Windows NT4 SP4. Click "Load Mod" button.

Problem: Program loops on I/O error during uninstall if ModUUID happens to be null.
Repro Steps: After program crashes from bug no. 2
Outcome: Program loops, claiming there was a general I/O error in file "". Also the SQL database loses it's entry for the mod's UUID.
Debugging Notes: Terminate program via process; closing main window causes the dialog loop to go infinitely fast. Seems to be stemming from Mod_Uninstall.
